column1: CIO-CI-Access Team, Ministry of Defence, CIO-FOI@mod.uk

column3: Request Summary
Please advise whether MOD hold any information on wrens that served at Anthony House during WWII.
Please provide information and details on the amount paid by MOD, by way of business rates, on vacant MOD property/accommodation for 2007/8, 2008/9, 2009/10, 2010/11 and 2011/12.

Please advise, and provide information and details, on the number of British servicewomen that have been sent home from Afghanistan and other areas of operations after becoming pregnant in the years 2010 and 2011.
Please advise on changes that have occurred to the wreck of HMS Victory 1744 since it was first discovered by Odyssey Marine Exploitation in 2009.
Please provide copies of the Resource and Account reports for 2004/5, 2005/6 and 2006/7. Please provide information and details of all PFI and PPP private firms used by MOD from 2000 - 2011.
Please advise, and provide information and details, on MOD's use of the Milner Field site, Yorkshire.
Please provide information on RAF personnel that have fallen since 2007.

Please advise, and provide information and details, on the total number of individuals on operations in Iraq between 2003 - 2011 tested for uranium in their urine, given an isotope test and found to be excreting depleted uranium.
Please advise on the correct position/description of CS gas.
Please provide copies of NI operational summaries from January - April 1992 and January - August 1994.
Please advise, and provide information and details to various questions regarding the UK's military assistance to Nigeria.
Please advise on the number of technical Broader Banded C1s and C2s in the RDP.
Please advise, and provide information and details, to various questions regarding the personnel in the RDP.
Please advise on the latest roadside bomb attack in Afghanistan that injured any British troops.
Please provide information and details on the Croatian military offensive Operation Storm that took place in August 1995.
Please provide information on the current status of the MDPGA's investigation into the SDSR leak.
Please provide copies of pictures of Prince Williams in the Falklands.

Please advise on whether there has ever been a 'dig' licence issued for the archaeological excavation of the crash site of the American P38G Lightning of 71st Fighter Squadron 1st Fighter Group based at RAF Debden.

Please provide transcripts and copies of all communications between MOD Andover (Defence Fire Service Executive) and the Defence Fire Training and Development Centre Manston regarding The Fire Strategy Company and its endeavour to provide civil aviation firefighter training at DFTDC Manston, between 2008 and end of 2011.
Please provide information on every callout detailed in DASA's Search and Rescue Annual reports from 1 January - 31 December 2011.

Please advise on whether there are any high security microwave links that may affect this development of the wind farm proposal in Dorcas Lane, Stoke Hammond for four  125m turbines by Force 9 Energy for EDF that is lodged with Aylesbury Vale District Council.
Please provide information and details on the UK-High Wycombe: Miscellaneous Services contract won by Serco in 2008.
Please advise, and provide information and details, to various questions regarding game shooting clubs organised/administered by either the Army, Navy or RAF.
Please advise, and provide information and details, on the number of Armed Service Personnel and police who will be on duty during the 2012 Olympic Games in London and associated costs.

Please provide any information regarding encounters with Unidentified Flying Objects, or FooFighters (as they were coined at the time), made by pilots, and/or members of bomber crews on bombing raids over Europe between 1942 - 1945.
Please provide information and details on the scope, responsible body and Terms of Reference for DTR reviews.

Please advise, and provide information and details, on MOD staff or related agencies that have been paid through 'tax efficient' arrangements, similar to those governing Ed Lester's employment at the Student Loans Company, in the last three years.
Please provide a copy of the Cyprus maps (24-sheets, scale 1:50,000 scale, K717 series) dated 1973.
Please advise, and provide information and details to various questions regarding depleted uranium.
Please provide information and details on the proposed wind turbine installation in the village of Ketton.
Please provide a copies of all the  minutes of the meetings for the 'Rifle Implementation Programme,' that was held at AWE, from 2008/9 - present.
Please provide information and details to various travel and Departmental costs since May 2010.
Please provide information and details on the different types of British propaganda used and its effectiveness in WWII.
Please provide statistical information on the number, type and severity of injuries caused on board Surface Ships to Royal Navy personnel particularly with regards to manual handling.
Please provide information on war pension appeal success rates.

Please provide copies of all correspondence within 2 Signal Brigade (Corsham) relating to the decisions taken to amend the RAO posts within 38 Signal Regiment and 32 Signal Regiment to OF2 on conversion of contracts from NRPS to FTRS.
Please advise on the number of Scots currently serving in the British military.
Please advise on the accessibility of WO 188/2751 file at the National Archives.
Please advise on the number of British soldiers that have had their long service good conduct medal taken away from them for a one off offence of absence without leave in the last fifteen years.
Please advise on when the discontinuity in the run of RN ratings service records held at the National Archives will be resolved.
Please advise on whether any technical construction drawings of the LVT4 Buffalo are held by MOD.
Please provide confirmation on whether the Fan Dance over Pen y Fan is no longer part of SAS selection.
Please advise, and provide information and details, on Brigadier Harencak's visits to AWE.
Please provide a copy of Goostrey PSD, Twemlow Cheshire Land Quality Assessment Phase one: Desk study DE Project No 12996.
Please provide details of information held by MOD on Spies For Peace and the search for its members.
Please provide verification of xxxxxx retirement date from the RAF.
Please provide statistical information to various questions regarding women employed in the services.
Please provide information and details on the trial and sentence of xxxxxx.

Please provide an unredacted copy of Ref: JSG/HQ/1/72349. Please provide information on the document, its purpose and its history and a detailed breakdown on each and every entry printed on the pages.
Please advise, and provide information and details, on SFA accommodation within Colchester Garrison.
Please provide information and details on the  strategy, tactics and costs entailed in arms companies lobbying the government or the EU.
Please advise on the total numbers serving in the British Army along with total number of civil servants employed in MOD currently, envisaged in 2014 and after redundancies have been implemented.
Please advise on the different RAF headwear.
Please advise, and provide information and details, on meetings between member of the ministerial team with any representatives of the firm Dechert from 8 February 2011 - present.
Please advise, and provide information and details, on changes the Oil and Pipeline Agency's redundancy policy.
Please provide information and details on the locations and structures of the British watchtowers in South Armagh.
Please provide information and details on the UK-Salisbury: Military Research and Technology dated 15 September 2011 ID 29077795-2011 framework agreement.
Please provide information and details on the UK-Salisbury: Development of an automated electro wetting based droplet actuation system dated 25 August 2011 ID 267936-2011 framework agreement.
Please provide information and details on the UK-Salisbury: Force Protection Engineering dated 23 August 2011 ID 264454-2011 framework agreement.
Please provide information and details on the UK-Salisbury Research Services dated 30 July 2011 ID 241122-2011 framework agreement.

Please provide details in respect of the following Framework Agreement Suppliers who applied for inclusion on each framework, successful and not successful at the PQQ and ITT stages' for contract dated 30 July 2011 ID 241118-2011.
Please provide information and details on the UK-Salisbury Research Services dated 14 May 2011 ID 152667-2011 framework agreement.

Please advise on the number of occasions the Secretary of State has issued certificates stating that an act has been done for the purpose of safeguarding national security or protecting public safety or public order in relation to Article 80 of the Fair Employment and Treatment Order 1998, Article 41A of the Race Relations (NI) Order 1997 (as amended), Regulation 30 of the Employment Equality (Age) Regulations (Northern Ireland) 2006, Article 53ZA Sex Discrimination (Northern Ireland) Order 1976 (as amended), Regulation 27 Employment Equality (Sexual Orientation) Regulations (Northern Ireland) 2003 along with the number of occasions the Secretary of State has defended appeals against such certificates to the tribunal established under section 91 of the Northern Ireland Act 1998.
Please advise on what happened to the ship bell on HMS Sheffield.
Please advise on how a copy of JSP 440 and JSP 490 can be obtained.
Please advise, and provide information and details to various questions, regarding the proportion of 16-25 year olds in Darlington that join the Armed Forces.
Please provide copies of Westland-Wessex brochure, etc documentation.
Please provide a detailed schedule of MOD properties that will be outsourced.
Please provide a list of all brands/models of whistles purchased by MOD in the last eighteen months.
Please provide information and details of all home communication exercises held during 1984 - 1992.
Please advise, and provide information and details, on the MOD's expenditure on external consultants.
Please provide copies of all correspondence held by MOD, from 1 January 1991 - present, sent or received by elected representatives on the issue of radiation at Dalgety Bay.
Please provide information and details of British Psychological Operations in Afghanistan in the last two years.
Please provide information and details held by MOD on ACO volunteers.

Please provide information on the regulations for air cadets using Blank Firing Adapters for the L98 A2 during field craft exercises and training along with details of any plans to change the current regulations.
Please advise, and provide details, on the level of testing conducted on the bader.mod.uk (SMS) portal to enable it to hold ACO staffs personal details.
Please advise, and provide information and details, on MOD's expenditure on various types of beverages.
Please advise on the number of people that have died or sustained life changing injuries whilst being in the custody of the British Armed Forces, or any branch of the MOD, from 1970 onwards.

Please provide copies of all correspondence held by MOD about staffing for and the policy decisions taken regarding the definitions of the Terms and Conditions of Service for The Ulster Defence Regiment Permanent Cadre, the Ulster Defence Regiment Part Time, the Royal Irish Regiment (Home Service Full time) and the Royal Irish Regiment (Home Service Part Time).
Please advise, and provide information and details, on the strength of the British Armed Forces since 1963.
Please provide three to five images of WWII RAF Fighter Command personnel.
Please provide statistical information and details to various questions regarding Armed Forces personnel and 'service children'.
Please advise, and provide information and details, on the number of Royal Navy pilots currently serving with the US Navy flying F18 jets or training to do so.
Please provide copies of all minutes, reports, attendance lists, submitted datasets and papers, and any other relevant documentation, from the depleted uranium workshops.
Please provide information on depleted uranium use in Iraq transferred to the MOD from the Radiation Protection Centre.

Please provide information and details on gritting treatment of the road carriageway, carried out on the main carriageway and adjoining pedestrian walkway between the South Gate and the South Tower at HMNB Clyde, Faslane, Helensburgh G74 8HL, during 18, 19 and 20 December 2010.
Please provide copies of the post-strike assessments of every UK weapons release from Reaper. Please advise on the number of weapons releases from Reaper UAV to date.
Please provide a hard copy of the Air Cadets fieldcraft manual ACP 16.
Please provide information and details on companies used by MOD for IT consultancy services.
Please advise, and provide information and details, on messaging services used by MOD.
Please provide a copy of the Audit of the Military Covenant: Report for the Directorate of Army Personnel Strategy [September 2007].
Please advise on the types of checks taken on Bilderberg Group members.
Please provide a copy, along with information and details, on MOD's official disposal policy.
Please provide information on the Rimini List.
Please advise on the percentage of serving members of the Armed Forces recruited in Scotland from 2000 until 2012.
Please advise, and provide information and details, on Staff Requirement (Air) 425 programme.
Please advise, and provide information and details to various questions, regarding officers of the rank Major General, Lieutenant General and General made redundant.
Please advise, and provide information and details, on the financial and other terms of the contract for the generation of income on the Defence Estate from non-military activities.
Please advise on whether any other regiment/corps, excluding REME, move personnel from higher pay band to lower pay band when promoted from sergeant to staff/colour sergeant.
Please advise, and provide information and details, on the number of injuries, fatalities are caused by IEDs.
Please advise if any MOD member of staff has received or is about to receive a bonus of any kind in the last twelve months.

Please provide information and details of spending on Government Procurement Cards, by Permanent Secretaries, from May 2009 to the present date. Please include the name of the permanent secretary, the date of the transaction, the item purchased, the name of the vendor (i.e. Sainsbury's), the reason for the purchase and the amount spent.

Please advise on the percentage of army officers and soldiers that went to public schools. Please advise on the amount of scholarships handed about by any of the Armed Forces along with the amount backed out of by the committing students.
Please advise, and provide information and details to various questions regarding Army personnel and PSTD.
Please provide information on the military history of the Land Rover Series 388 built in 1978.
Please provide information and details on train travel warrant cost for all three arms of the Armed Forces for the last three financial years.
Please advise if spent blank firing rounds can be collected and submitted to local scrap metal dealers.
Please advise on the accessibility of WO 67/21 and WO 67/23 files.
Please advise, and provide information and details, on the British forces awareness to Pyridiostigmine Bromide and other nerve agents during the Iraq conflict.
Please advise, and provide information and details to various questions regarding regulations military nurses and doctors are subject to.
Please provide a copy of meteorological data recorded at Dalton Barracks/RAF Abingdon, Oxfordshire.
Please provide information and details of all civil service posts currently being filled by Agency Staff/Temporary staff/External assistance.
Please advise, and provide information and details to various questions, regarding sick absences in MOD in 2011.
Please provide information on Operation Green Desert.
Please advise, and provide information and details, on guidance issued on banned sports/game in the Army.

Please provide the titles of all documents which contain supporting evidence for the decision to reject Barrow-in-Furness as a candidate site for a submarine dismantling facility, together with the number of pages in each document and a one sentence summary of the scope of the document.
Please provide details of the internet facing IP addresses or address range of the link between DII and the World Wide Web.

Please advise on how Plymouth's naval space is being affected by the current defence cuts and military budgeting and if the military is releasing any of the Devonport dockyards site to attract SMEs, housing and economic growth.

Please advise, and provide information and details, on whether the MOD has engaged Lockheed Martin, or a similar defence company, to supply Armed Unmanned Aerial vehicles (UAVs) using tasers to operate in London.
Please provide a list of fuel suppliers to UK forces in Afghanistan.
Please advise, and provide information and details, on the different health covers or health care offered to military personnel.
Please advise on the grading dates and grades awarded for South Close, Medmenham, SL7 2EE for the past twelve years.
Please advise on how sight of the Navigation Data Book can be arranged.
Please provide information and details on the displaced Award given to Malik Muhammad Uddin after WWII.
Please provide the latest capitation rates for the RAF's Typhoon aircraft.
Please provide information about recruitment activities undertaken for the Oil and Pipelines Agency by Adderley Featherstone plc.

Please provide a copy of a complete record of all the gifts and hospitality offered to, or accepted by, senior officers, and all the declarable expenses incurred by them in the most recent two years, for which records are available.
Please advise, and provide information and details, on the number of staff employed by MOD who earn less than £8.30 and £7.25 an hour.
Please clarify which PFI schemes have been included under ICT and Telecomms Service concession arrangements.
Please provide information and details on the  post-war fate of Taras Bulba-Borovets.
Please provide Army recruitment statistics from 2010 - 2011.
Please provide a copy of the information filed under Community Form # 61/03/02/12.
Please provide information on chemtrails.
Please advise, and provide information and details, on the number of NFCI that have occurred during training at RMAS in the last five years.
Please provide a copy of the RAF Police document # 1202064/1.
Please provide information and drawings of the old torpedo platform off the shore at Antrim in Lough Neagh.
Please advise if a copy of the list of the potential nuclear target list and associated information from around 1972 has been placed in the National Archives.
Please provide information and details on the number of weapons recorded as lost and stolen in 2011.
Please provide historical information on the underground command bunker at RAF Daws Hill in High Wycombe, Bucks.
Please provide an up-to-date list of subcontractors, suppliers and consultants involved in the design and construction of the new jetty to be used as a new warship ammunition depot.
Please provide a detailed breakdown of the costs incurred to the military for their responses to aid the Civil Authorities in the 2001 foot and mouth outbreak and the 2007 floods.
Please provide statistical information on the number of military personnel that were medically discharged, in the last six years, for hypermobility syndrome.
Please provide statistical information on the number of military personnel that started their career already having hypermobility syndrome.
Please provide statistical information on the number of military personnel that made claims to the AFCS for hypermobility syndrome in the last six years.
Please provide statistical information on the number of military personnel currently employed with hypermobility syndrome.
Please advise, and provide information and details to various questions regarding supply convoys that provide over-land logistical support to NATO operations in Afghanistan.
Please advise and provide information and details on the number of bullying and harassment complaints made by MOD staff citing senior MOD staff as perpetrators between January 2008 - October 2011.
Please provide a copy of recorded domestic abuse in December 2009.

Please provide architectural drawings and information on whether the Sea Fort located just off Plymouth break water and the disused Plymouth Maritime Headquarter (Mount Wise) are available for sale and the cost.
Please provide information and details of the investigation into the cancellation of the procurement for future search and rescue capability.
Please provide information and details of contracts signed with JWT, Capita and other bodies to deliver recruitment campaigns since 2010.
Please advise, and provide information and details to various questions regarding the Royal Air Force Aerobatic Team.
Please advise, and provide information and details to various questions regarding Distribute Denial of Service (DDoS) attacks in the last twelve months.
Please provide information on the outcomes and conclusions of the Board of Inquiry held aboard HMS Kent in 1977/1978.

Please provide details of your current contracts for the provision of temporary or agency staff. For the avoidance of doubt, we assume that temporary or agency staff contracts refers to the services provided by recruitment agencies for the supply of staff to the organisation on a temporary or contract basis.

Please provide details of your current contracts for the provision of temporary or agency staff.  For the avoidance of doubt, we assume that temporary or agency staff contracts refers to the services provided by recruitment agencies for the supply of staff to the organisation on a temporary or contract basis. Our request does not extend to consulting contracts or agreements with sole contractors.
Please provide information and details of hospitality and rail and air travel received from Capita or any of its subsidiaries, by MOD personnel, in the last nine month and year respectively.
Please advise, and provide information and details, about the Chinook's maintenance manuals.

Please provide information and details of all meetings between MOD personnel (ministers, officials, service personnel) and the lobbying firm Quiller or its senior personnel (notably George Bridges) over the past twelve months.

Please provide information and details of any representation made to the MOD by any government department or minister (including No 10 Downing St Treasury and Civil Service Dept) which contained any information on the financial position of Capita.

Please advise, and provide information and details, on the legal contractual obligations imposed on QinetiQ, the operators of the MOD Pendine Test Range, on how and what measures they are required to protect the residents of St Ishmaels from their activities.
Please advise on the not issuing a PAR when leaving the MOD on 30 December 2011.
Please provide information on the veteran population of all three services now resident within NHS Bedfordshire boundaries.
Please provide the names of the politicians who have been the Defence Minister since the Labour Party came into power in the 1990s.
Please advise on whether any air defence radar sites are in existence or planned to be in existence within 75km of MK17 9DE.
Please advise, and provide information and details, on any ammunition fired by British forces, in the last year, during operations involving pirates along the Somali coast and the Gulf of Aden.
Please provide a copy, and information and details, of the UK Critical Materials Report for Energetics and Propulsion.
Please provide information and details on power units either being used and or being considered for UAVs intended for development.
Please advise and provide copies of 1944 War Office General Staff Geographical Survey maps of Northern Greece.
Please advise on the remedial action taken when radon levels were above 400 Bq/m3.
Please advise, and provide information and details, on the number of complaints received from non-civilian Armed Forces personnel concerning kit or equipment shortages in 2010 and 2011.
Please provide copies of plans for any military training exercises, to be carried out in the Scottish Borders, in the next few months.
Please provide copies of records and information held on xxxxxx regarding SFA allocation.
Please advise, and provide information and details, on the aircraft that was flying at low altitude to the west of Turriff, Aberdeenshire on 17 February 2011.

Would it be possible to find how much was spent on train travel through the central defence travel contract and if possible for this to be broken down into individual Armed Force Services and also class of travel.
Please advise, provide information and details, on whether MOD have a computer systems that uses either pattern matching or machine learning and the specific tasks that requires this.

Please provide copies of correspondence relating to the permission and refusal of the use of training areas for motor sport events, under the control of Defence Training Estates Wales and West, between January 2010 and 19 February 2012.
Please provide a photograph of the uniform for the 86th AGRA and any other interesting details of the Queen's coronation.
Please advise, and provide information and details, on MOD's costs to send teams to the Forces Rugby World Cup 2011.
Please advise of the accessibility of the National Archives retained document AIR 40/3130.
Please advise, and provide information and details, of memorials for fallen British soldiers in Bosnia.
Please provide a copy of the noise survey carried out at Brize Norton airfield in 2011.
Please provide information and details of all items lost and/or stolen, with a value of more than Â£500, recorded by MOD between 18 February 2011 and 18 February 2012.
Please provide a copy of all correspondence between John Nott and Margaret Thatcher on the sale of Super Etendard aircraft and Exocet missiles from November 1981 - July 1982.
Please provide policy information and details regarding public access and availability of non-sensitive, recorded radar data.
Please provide information and details of the UK's foreign policy and strategy in the Middle East.
Please advise, and provide information and details, on Infantry sergeant and Warrant Officer sashes.
Please provide information and details on meetings government representatives have had with weapon companies' lobbyists in 2010 - 2011.
Please advise, and provide information and details, on the status of SFA in Paderborn and Sennelager.
Please provide information and details on the British government's spend on purchases from weapons companies in 2010-11.
Please advise, and provide information and details, to various questions regarding security vetting of service personnel prior to attending the nuclear test trials on Christmas Island.
Please advise, and provide information and details, on the total amount paid in bonuses to civil servants and service personnel, on active duty, in the last twelve months.
Please provide information on the number of days spent by MOD senior officials in Brussels, Luxembourg, Strasbourg, or any other European destination, on European Union business in 2011.
Please advise on the number and types of occasions military helicopters have crossed airspace close to Culbane Rd, Porglenone, BT44 8NZ between and including 13 February 2007 - 13 February 2009.
Please advise, and provide information and details, on the enterprise storage brands purchase in 2011 and 2010.
Please advise, and provide information and details, on the number of break-in and burglaries on MOD properties and military assets in the last three years.
Please advise, and provide information and details, on the total number of personnel and children supported by the Continuity of Education Allowance in each financial year from 2007-08 to 2011-12.
Please provide information and details on the latest AWOL statistics from 2011 - present. Please clarify MOD's definition of AWOL.
Please provide copies of MOD Annual Reports for 2004/5, 2005/6 and 2006/7.
Please provide a digital copy of the ACP 16 Fieldcraft Manual.
Please provide information and details of UFO sightings made to the MOD.
Please provide copies of War Pension manuals.

Please advise on whether MOD hold any records produced by units of the Army, RAF, or Royal Navy which were based on Cyprus at any time between 1 April 1955 and 30 March 1959 and if this information is available to the public at the National Archives.
Please provide information and details of all field trials, conducted in 2009, which have involved the release of biological material (e.g. Biological Warfare stimulants) on MOD or Crown property.
Please provide copies of all environment impact assessments related to the live firing range at Cape Wrath.
Please advise if there are any records of the 'military' use of Mill Farm, Besthorpe, Notts or of any site investigation/clearance being carried out.
Please provide a copy of the winning proposal for the contract award.
Please advise, and provide information and details, to various questions regarding MDPGA's current contract for the provision of temporary or agency staff.
Please advise in what format central data on research and/or development projects is collected and stored in MOD.
Please advise whether any information is held on the events of the night of 26 September 1994 at RAF Boscombe Down.
Please provide information and detail on the historical mileage rates that were claimable by military personnel for travel from home to duty or place of work.
Please advise on the amount of money paid in 2010/2011 by MOD to Clinton Devon Estates for the use of Woodbury Common, Lympstone, Devon as a training area for the Royal Marines.
Please advise, and provide information and details, to various questions regarding radioactive sediment at Aldermaston Manor.
Please advise, and provide information and detail, on the number of Territorial Army, non-mobilised or FTRS members that received paid leave in each year since 2000 to 2011.
Please advise on what happened to the contents of the Officer's Mess at the former RAF Sealand on its closure.
Please provide information and details of service records regarding a relative.
Please advise on the number of British troops that have been deployed to Afghanistan since the beginning of the mission.
Please provide information and details on the current (2011/12) Financial Retention Incentives paid in the Army.

Please provide information and details on the facilities and ports that the Royal Naval Reserve and Royal Naval Auxiliary Service were intended to occupy in the event of a WWIII style mobilisation during the Cold War.
Please provide a copy of the MOD's policy on dealing with Royal Navy and military wrecks.
Please advise on the authority responsible for installing and maintaining street lights on the unadopted end of Chazey Road.
Please provide copies of any correspondence with the Health Protection Agency relating to radioactive contamination at Dalgety Bay in Fife since September 2011.
Please advise, and provide information and details to various questions, regarding incidents and accidents involving University Air Squadrons in the South Central Area.
Please provide details of the precautionary measures that were taken on the island of Kiritimati between 1957 -  1962 to prevent radiation exposure to the participants working on the island.
Please provide a copy of the Soldier's Guide to the Law of Armed Conflict (Army Code No. 771130).
Please advise, and provide information and details, on the numbers of NISGS staff currently on Special Paid Leave.
Please advise on the number of occasions Dstl's powers of entry were used during 2008 - 2011.
Please advise, and provide information and details to various questions, regarding Dstl's current contract for the provision of temporary or agency staff.
Please provide copies of various Army publications.
Please advise on the accessible of the WO 208/4977 file at the National Archives.

Please provide information and details on DE/DIO expenditure, specifically relating to the organisation's eventual transformation to its Enhanced Operating Model, on external consultants in FY 10/11 and FY 11/12.

Please provide copies of the minutes of any meetings from 22 October - 11 November 1983 that deal with officials discussing Mr Michael Heseltine's leaked memo about Greenham Common along with minutes that discussed the prosecution and minutes that discussed the trial of xxxxxx.
Please provide a copy of the report that MOD released about the bio weapons trials over England from the 1940s through to 1979.

Please provide details of communications/discussions MOD has had internally and externally concerning the Military Wives/The Choir BBC TV programme and Military Wives music release and performances between 7 December 2011 and 23 February 2012.
Please provide a copy of the latest reports into the potential problems of 'skills fade' in the Armed Forces.
Please provide a copy of DVA's Annual reports for 2001 and 2002.
Please provide a copy of the list regarding A and V class vessels along with a copy of the memo sent to IOR which contained this information.
Please advise on the number of living veterans from all three services.
Please provide copies of all media handling and ‘lines to take’ briefing material on the sale of 72 Harrier aircraft to the US Marine Corps held by MOD's Press Office and Private Offices.
Please advise on when the next review on MOD's radioactive waste management practices will take place.
Please advise on the 'Trout memo' and how a copy can be obtained.
Please advise on the accessibility of all remaining files, and other associated correspondence, concerning the Dieppe Raid of 19 August 1942.
Please advise, and provide information and details, on MOD's annual expenditure on the Armed Forces.
Please provide information and details on the site on Hillock Lane, Warton, PR4 1TP.
Please advise, and provide statistical information and details to various questions on the Army and Royal Navy.
Please provide a copy of the recently updated CE factors and pension credit for pension sharing on divorce.

Please provide copies of all documents related to the Canadian nuclear accidents of April 2009, November 2009 at Bruce Nuclear facility, Ontario Canada. Please provide information and details on the sharing of nuclear event information between Canada and the  UK. Please advise, and provide information and details on the total number of nuclear related injuries between 2005- 2012.
Please advise, and provide information and details, on the use of Pyridostigmine Bromide (NAPS) Tablets by the Armed Forces.
Please provide any information held by MOD relating to the internment of the Iranian General Fazlollah Zahedi in Palestine by British forces under Sir Fitzroy Maclean during WWII.
Please provide information and details of medals and clasps issued by the MOD Medal Office for historical campaigns.
Please provide information and details of all ministerial directions issued in the Department in each year since 2001.
Please provide the full results, incl. supporting documents, of the MOD service inquiry into the suicide of Mne Dylan Kemp.
Please provide clarification, along with information and details, on head costs for the RFCAGL.
Please provide information and details of MOD funding made to RFCAGL recruiting, retention and community engagement activities regarding reserves and cadet forces, staff and cadets since 2007/08.
Please advise whether MOD hold Ordnance Survey maps/aerial photographs/military maps between 1930 and 1960 of a former RAF site in High Wycombe.
Please provide copies of the minutes and agendas for the MOD Defence R&D board's meetings from 2007 to 2010.
Please advise on the medical companies that supply the MOD with IV giving sets for both the field situation and hospital use.
Please provide information on the number of flights and total flying hours of the Handley Page Victor.

Please provide copies of all  information, held by MOD, relevant to the provision of wartime protected accommodation for each United Kingdom Supply Agency/National Air Transport Agency section, during the years 1968-1970 inclusive.
Please advise, and provide information and details, to various questions regarding Non-Freezing Cold Injuries in the last five years.
Please provide details of the trial and sentencing of xxxxxx, of the Army Catering Corps, who murdered his wife in 1977.
Please advise on the number of personnel presently serving in the Armed Forces, who have an address in the Republic of Ireland.
Follow-on MOD police investigation. Request for MOD police to consider supporting information as a formal complaint and act accordingly.
Please provide information on the Heinkel shot down over France at the beginning of WWII.
Please provide statistical information on the employment rates of ex service men from 2008 - 2012.
Please advise, and provide information and details to various questions regarding ex-service personnel and serving service personnel based in Devon.
Follow-on enquiry about xxxxxx complaints and Petition to the Sovereign.
Please provide information and details on the Lancaster aircraft crash in 1943.
Please provide an annual breakdown on the number of military working dogs that have been retired or euthanised from 2008 - 2012.
Please provide information on the number of volunteers for military service between 1995 and 2005.
Please provide information and details to various questions about the information management and records management systems in MOD.
Please provide information on 'ex gratia' compensation payments made in 1947.
Please provide information and details to various questions regarding the wreck of HMS Victiory (1744) and Odyssey Marine Exploration Inc and its correspondence with MOD relating to Victory (1744).
Please advise and provide information on the accessibility of DEFE 28/103, DEFE 28/104 and DEFE 28/112 files at the National Archives.

Please advise, and provide information and details, on whether MOD has referred any particular policy proposal, or piece of draft legislation and or bill to the Prince of Wales and or the Duchy of Cornwall from 6 May 2010 - present.
Please provide copies of any dimensioned drawings for the Challenger 2 MBT.
Please provide information and details on the number of soldiers that survived, along with the numbers that died, for WWI, WWII, Afghanistan and more recent conflicts.
Please provide information and details on the impact of 'budget cuts' in the Armed Forces.
